attributes.action: Hold up Lancashire county Council decision to ban Fracking
attributes.additional_details: Families with Children will now have to live next to this site, as there will be little chance of selling there homes to move.
attributes.background: Today the government have over turned the decision by LCC to ban fracking near Blackpool. This decision is a disgrace as no one wants it here. The fracking will tack place on Preston new road just outside Blackpool. There are a number of homes that will be very close to the site.
